title: PBE Error
body: When I try to play PBE, after joining a game, the screen just goes black and stays frozen? How can this be fixed?

replies.body: Hey, this black screen can happen if your connection is having problems reaching the game server so it can't download any assets.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help fix this up!
Hi, I managed to fix it by changing my DNS and pressing enter when I get the black screen and it works! Many other mac users have this problem too for some reason.
